Name: Community Pharmacy
Description: A location used for community pharmacy

Name: Admission
Description: A location used for patient admission

Name: Payment Point
Description: A location used to manage cash points

Name: Admission Location
Description: Patients may only be admitted to inpatient care in a location with this tag

Name: Transfer Location
Description: Patients may only be transfer to inpatient care in a location with this tag

Name: Visit Location
Description: A location where a patient may have a visit

Name: Nursery/Newborn Ward
Description: Admission ward for newborns and pre-term babies

Name: ICU Ward
Description: Admission ward for Intensive care cases

Name: HDU Ward
Description: Admission ward for High dependency  cases

Name: Mortuary Location
Description: Deceased patients may only be admitted to mortuary care in a location with this tag
